rows.label: qev051301_MSG0001
rows.name: I am glad you came as you promised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0002
rows.name: Allow me to introduce my master, Adolphus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I wish we had the time to share a drink and become
properly acquainted, but I fear I must get straight to
the point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0004
rows.name: New rumors of the Celeste Three have arisen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0005
rows.name:
A group of men are... Well, they WERE keeping a
hoard of white gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0006
rows.name: These men are no longer alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Their treasure, however, remains hidden behind a door
armed with a most formidable security system, or so
the stories go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0011
rows.name: Say it's a story you're well familiar with.

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if Adolphus aims to open that door.

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0008
rows.name: Your information network is impressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0009
rows.name:
I knew Ga Bewhe would find me an astute BLADE
operative, and I am not disappointed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0010
rows.name: Which brings us to my proposal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0011
rows.name: You will gather the four keys needed to open the door.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0012
rows.name:
In return, I will pay you a most fair reward.
How does five million credits sound?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to the deal.

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0040
rows.name: Negotiate

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0041
rows.name: Press Adolphus for more money.

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0013
rows.name: Always a pleasure working with sensible people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0014
rows.name:
White gold's trading price has always been infamously
volatile, you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I was bracing for the worst when it came to negotiating
our rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0016
rows.name: It seems we have a [ST:gender p1=businessman p2=businesswoman ] on our hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0017
rows.name:
I suppose that's standard operating procedure for this
sort of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0018
rows.name:
The trading price for white gold is especially volatile,
even compared to other rare metals. I expect you're
well aware of this fact, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0019
rows.name:
I understand your desire to push for a higher price,
but my position already has a great deal of risk.
This is a gamble we'll need to take together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0020
rows.name:
What I offer you is a fifty-fifty split,
which is more than fair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0021
rows.name: Take it or leave it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0022
rows.name:
As I said, you will be gathering four keys in total.
Please begin your search immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0023
rows.name: I await your report, and trust it will be good news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0024
rows.name:
When next we meet, I expect it will be in front of the
vault door. I look forward to it greatly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now, as for the keys' whereabouts, I believe I can be
of some help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0026
rows.name:
If I am not mistaken, you are in possession of three of
them yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0027
rows.name:
My master is not yet aware of that particular fact,
but you need not hide it from me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0028
rows.name:
I selected you for this job precisely because I knew you
held them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0029
rows.name:
If you supply those three, I will supply you with the
location of the fourth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0030
rows.name: A win-win proposal, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0031
rows.name:
All I ask in return is a portion of your share.
I think that a more pleasant option for both of us
than for me to attempt to take your keys by force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Ga Bewhe why she hasn't told
Adolphus about your keys.

rows.label: qev051301_JNK0060
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev051301_SEL0061
rows.name: Mock Ga Bewhe for being such a schemer.

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0032
rows.name:
I hope that you will give me your trust, seeing as I am
the one who included you in this proposal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0033
rows.name:
My master's trade draws massive profits,
but my salary remains a pittance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0034
rows.name:
I require as much money as possible to ease the
poverty my people face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0035
rows.name:
And for your part, you stand to receive a fortune for
the small effort of acquiring but one more key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Far from it, I assure you—it is my employer who is the
villain here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0037
rows.name: But the influence he holds makes him unassailable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0038
rows.name:
I am merely trying to secure money to improve the
conditions of my impoverished people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0039
rows.name: Surely that is reasonable justification?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0040
rows.name: Now, as for the final key...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0041
rows.name: It seems a BLADE named Law is in possession of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0042
rows.name:
He works for a fellow called Wang—I believe their
team is currently in Sylvalum on a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0043
rows.name:
As a fellow BLADE, you should have no problem
approaching them in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Perhaps if you join them in their work,
an opportunity to secure the key will present itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0045
rows.name:
I leave the means to you, though. As far as we are
concerned, all that matters is that you acquire it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051301_MSG0046
rows.name: I wish you great success.[ST:wait ]
